website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-use ovulation test strips for a great value.
pros: Many buyers note that these tests were particularly easy to read
Gives accurate results within five minutes
cons: Make sure to test in the afternoon, not the morning, but that's recommended with all ovulation tests

customer_reviews.title: They just don't work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to help track my possibly non-existent ovulation. I used them for multiple months (correctly, non-expired), and I couldn't detect any consistency at all. For a while I was convinced that I was the one with issues. Then I bought a different version (of the same Easy@Home brand!!) and VOILA! I had a consistent LH surge. I tested these in parallel through the entire first month I had the new strips, and these strips were negative through my entire cycle. The new strips showed a normal LH increase and surge. I've had to throw away the remaining strips from this Wondfo. A total waste of money. NOT recommended.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: These helped me find my ovulation date even when I would test in the evening (versus the morning when urine is more concentrated) or when the urine was fresh and hadn't sat out to come down to room temperature (as the directions recommend. Great product to use while TTC or to ...
customer_reviews.text: Work as expected. All had current best-by dates (not expired). I believe I only had one stick out of the two packs I bought of these that was unusable (the clear plastic part was coming off of the stick). Very clear to see the LH surge with the dark line. These helped me find my ovulation date even when I would test in the evening (versus the morning when urine is more concentrated) or when the urine was fresh and hadn't sat out to come down to room temperature (as the directions recommend. Great product to use while TTC or to track your cycle in general.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: They work, but you can get better
customer_reviews.text: They work, but I don't think they are as accurate or fast-developing as Pregmate. I started using LH test strips when my cycle returned while breastfeeding my 3rd child. We use Natural Family Planning (fertility awareness) and these are a handy tool. They are affordable and easy to use if you follow the instructions. In comparing them to comparably a priced Pregmate strips, I am not likely to repurchase Wondfo. They don't seem quite as sensitive as Pregmate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Result is not clear
customer_reviews.text: I use an app to check my ovulation besides using this test strip. I started using the strip 2 days before the actual ovulation day (based on the app). I want to double check to make sure my high chance of getting a baby. Every time I use the test strip, the result is showing a messy line, not really clear if it's 1 line or 2 lines. I can't tell. And it was the same result like that for the entire week. This test strips used to be good long time ago (recommended from my friend) but now is a waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: Uyen Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Best I've bought so far!
customer_reviews.text: When ttc, things can get expensive and buying these internet cheapies always seems like a great idea until you get a bunch of an accurate test, but I have nothing but Praises for these. Solid clear lines that showed progression over the course of five days getting darker towards my surge blazing positive during my surge and then getting lighter after. Would buy again and recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I now have a baby
customer_reviews.text: It took two years of trying, but I'm writing this review as I rock my 6 month old to sleep. Pee in a cup and dip this in. Follow the instructions and they're great. These helped me know when I ovulated with great accuracy. I recommend combining these with Fertility Friend (phone app - subscribed version) and tracking your BBT
customer_reviews.author: Flootey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & Effective
customer_reviews.text: I love these tests. I used them for 2 years when we were trying to conceive our first child (ended up needing IVF), and I'm using them again now while we TTC #2! I've only had two pp cycles, and these picked up ovulation on CD 17 both times. I got AF exactly two weeks after. It seems my first pregnancy may have helped regulate the hormonal issues I was previously facing. Anyway, that's neither here nor there. If you want to be able to test multiple times a day to ensure that you catch your LH surge, these are great. Super cost-effective, and I have found them to be reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Not of great quality (waste of money)
customer_reviews.text: TTC is a stressful and strategic time for women, and their partners as it is. I bought these as the reviews were great but personal experience... not so much. The entire time of ovulation week the second line never really showed up. When I used the last test of the other brand I typically use, the second line (not the test line) was really bright. I feel these were a total waste of money and am extremely disappointed that such an inferior product is being sold to women under so much pressure to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Buy

customer_reviews.title: The best ovulation predictor!
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended by my husband's doctor when we were having trouble conceiving. The first time I've ever been able to catch my ovulation was with this testing kit. We were successfully able to get pregnant and now have a beautiful baby girl. I'm very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and come in a nice sized pack of 50. LH tests are sometimes hard to read regardless--so I won't fault the product for that. At first I thought I was losing my mind and I couldn't read the tests or I was doing it wrong--but then when it actually WAS showing LH levels it was a real AH HA moment for me. I recommend using them pretty regularly at first so you have a better idea of what a positive looks like vs. negative. Sometimes they are close calls, but if you do them regularly you might see a difference in the color (gets darker) so you can confirm that it is LH+ reading.
customer_reviews.author: Susan T

customer_reviews.title: So far seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: So I got these on Saturday and perfectly in enough time to test my LH surge. I had previously purchased Generation Guard ovulation tests and have been testing myself everyday since my period ended. Those all cam back negative. I thought I better try another batch of tests because I need a second opinion so I ordered Wondfo ovulation tests. As you can see, the Wonddo clearly show a positive result, where as Generation Guard you can barely see the second pink line. We BD'd last night so fingers crossed I will become pregnant. I will update this If we have a positive pregnancy test.
customer_reviews.author: carolynn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worthless
customer_reviews.text: Just look at the photo. Exact same urine sample, different results. The Wondfo pack that I got gave me the same result every time. Barely even a solid control line, and a faint LH line. Finally I tried another brand (Pregmate) and saw results. I wish I could get my money back for these because they literally DO NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Letsgo4five

customer_reviews.title: Good luck, ladies * baby dusts*
customer_reviews.text: They work, but whenever I tested it too later. My ovulation day 10 of 26 days cycle. Have been keeping track of my cycle since the beginning, still same for the most part. Good luck, ladies * baby dusts* !!!! Especially to the ladies that will using UI or ICI treatments to become pregnant !
customer_reviews.author: R. M.

customer_reviews.title: After a snafu with my insurance company rendering my birth ...
customer_reviews.text: After a snafu with my insurance company rendering my birth control unavailable for 2 months, I bought these strips to make sure we wouldn't have any unplanned pregnancies. Sure enough, I ovulated that first month - the two lines were perfectly clear to read. We were careful to prevent pregnancy while the insurance company figured out their issues, and are continuing our family planning for now. When we do decide we are ready to start a family, I feel confident that these strips will tell me when my body is ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: ... reviews but I needed to come back and highly recommend these little strips
customer_reviews.text: I literally NEVER leave product reviews but I needed to come back and highly recommend these little strips. After "kind of" trying for baby #2 for 3 or 4 months with no luck I ordered these. 3 weeks later and I've got a positive pregnancy test to show for it! Interpreting them takes a bit of getting used to and there are many resources online that can help. I would really recommend testing 2-3 times a day when you suspect your LH surge is approaching, so you catch it right away and maximize opportunities to capitalize. Awesome product. Awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and very accurate!
customer_reviews.text: As much as testing stressed me out checking for ovulation these tests never guided me wrong! I paired these tests with the Premom app and never once questioned if I was ovulating or not. We needed some help from clomid to conceive our miracles but both times I used this product to track for ovulation. Im now 19+6 with our rainbow twins!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not as sensitive as other strips I've used.
customer_reviews.text: The lines on these, even the control lines, took longer than the instructed 5 min to show up. The test lines rarely got even as dark as the control lines, even when I confirmed a positive test on another brand of strips. I would not personally recommend these based on what seems to be low sensitivity and too many questions they raised for me about accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Work great, get the job done
customer_reviews.text: These strips worked great. I didn’t have an issue reading the results. I tested twice a day for a few days and there was no question once I got the positive. It was actually a little surprising how clear the positive result was since I expected to have to interprete the darkness of the line and make a judgement because I heard from a few people that the only thing that worked for them were digital tests with flashing smiley face. I would definitely recommend these strips over anything 3-4 times more expensive from a drugstore.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra Z.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I was using Clinicalguard but I have never had a clear positives !"as dark or darker than the control line" on my first cycle using Wondfo I had a clear positive for the first time ! Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Abrar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read, and very accurate!
customer_reviews.text: My preferred method of testing for ovulation is with a digital test, but those get expensive fast. These Wondfo strips work great, with easy to read results. I know my surge is happening, and I'm about to ovulate when the test line is DARKER than the control line. In my experience, if the test lines are the same color, it is not a true positive (even though the instructions say it is.)
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: I've been using these on and off for a year ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these on and off for a year while TTC. They are extremely accurate. Some say it's difficult to determine if it's positive, but I've never had a problem. Both the test and control line are the same darkness, or the test line is slightly darker than the control. When I get a positive, I know I will ovulate the next day. And without a doubt, exactly 2 weeks later, I get my period. Very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany HooksTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Better than ClinicalGaurd BY FAR
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasnt so happy with these strips because the "negative" result wasnt entirely clear. The majority of the time it looked like an "almost positive". However, today the true positive couldnt be more clear if it tried to! Once you see your first surge on these, the results are much easier to recognize. PS. These strips have much clearer results compared to ClinicalGaurd.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it from an unreputable seller no returns allowed.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product before from other more higher reviewed sellers. This time the ink is all messed up and bleeds all over the place. Two lines show up again and again both the same color And btw it's impossible for me to be ovulating at this point in my cycle
customer_reviews.author: SYLVIANRUSE

customer_reviews.title: Great tests! Helped me get pregnant
customer_reviews.text: After dealing with infertility for a little while I peed on a lot of these. I had no trouble reading the if it was a positive opk or negative. When I finally got my first positive ovulation test after seeing no many negatives it was obvious. Side Note: When I finally got pregnant and had my pregnancy confirmed by a doctor, I peed on two of these because I was curious and they came out positive. I thought that was interesting and thought that I would share.
customer_reviews.author: J Street

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: These ovulation sticks are the BOMB! You just can't get that many test strips and accuracy for the price!! They were right on spot with when I ovulated. Although we haven't conceived due to fertility issues with my husband, it was nice to know I didn't through money away on useless test. If you are wanting to track when you ovulate these bad boys are it!
customer_reviews.author: P. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read!
customer_reviews.text: These test strips are hard to read and can be all over the place. The control line varies in color from strip to strip. Some have been light and some come in super dark. The picture I attached the control line is pretty light compared to the others. Will be ordering a different brand next time!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Singer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, No Frills Option!
customer_reviews.text: When I started thinking about trying to get pregnant, my doctor recommended that I track my ovulation because I had some concerns that I would have difficulty conceiving. When looking at the prices of name brand ovulation tests, I wasn't too enthusiastic...until I saw these. A simple, inexpensive option allowed me to test frequently (some might say excessively) and get a good sense of my cycle before deciding to try to get pregnant. I am convinced that these strips were the key to getting a quick positive result...and I didn't go broke in the process! The steps are simple and I had no trouble reading the results!
customer_reviews.author: A. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: I like others better
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy home ones better. These, after the recommended time, ALL SHOW Positive. Where the easy @ home brand stay true to the differing level of ink between the lines even after the recommenced time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rocha

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: These are a way better option then the expensive kits. I used this for two months and got pregnant the second month. I have very long cycles so having these inexpensive strips to use for daily testing was a life saver. I used at the same time as a much more expensive digital kit and found that one to be inaccurate. These are accurate, easy to read, and affordable. Test every day until you see a positive.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous225588

customer_reviews.title: Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: These are affordable and easy to use. Pair it with an app or journal so you can keep readings logged. But these are accurate just follow the directions that are also easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate

customer_reviews.title: How to PREVENT a pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Great brand. Easy to read. Very clear instructions printed with colorful ink. I use these test strips to PREVENT a pregnancy. I use the app Natural Cycles and these strips let me know exactly when I'm ovulating. They are very clear. The last off-brand I used was extremely unclear. This brand is seriously amazing and you will be 100% satisfied when you buy this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Thorsen

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: they seemed to work fine. great value for your money. you should definitely go with these if you are trying to conceive and are spending a lot of money on test strips at your local store. me and my husband were trying for a long time and buying these helped save money and they worked just as good as the ones in the store.
customer_reviews.author: brendap98

customer_reviews.title: Great price and works well
customer_reviews.text: I've been using OPK's for years and finally decided to order these based on the recommendations of others. If you test a lot, have irregular cycles or PCOS, the price is right. Store bought opk's are outrageously priced! These worked very well for me and will order them again. They are pretty sensitive, but you will know if it's truly positive by how quickly the test line darkens. My surge and ovulation were accurately confirmed with thermal shift.
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price, but you get what you pay for. The strips can be streaky and sometimes the control line is not always solid. However, they work! I’ve never had a positive that wasn’t 100% clear. It’s also nice seeing the line get darker in the days and hours leading up to ovulation. I love that these are so cheap that I don’t have to worry about using 2 in a day if I think ovulation will happen soon.
customer_reviews.author: LSD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty accurate, I still need to get blood work ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty accurate, I still need to get blood work done b/c my ovulation is all over the place, but as long as you follow the directions and do it 1-2 times a day you should get a good reading. I also recommend peeing in a cup and dipping, if you pee to much on the stick it wont give you a good reading.
customer_reviews.author: Sharmaine Clement

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I’ll stick to clearblue so I can get a direct answer. I did not care for the guessing work. Good if you have the time and patience.
customer_reviews.author: moi

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I have PCOS and don't ovulate on a regular schedule. These give unmistakable results. I got these in October of 2014 and was pregnant in November 2014. Very helpful for women that don't ovulate on the usual 2 weeks after a period.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: worked fine for me
customer_reviews.text: When my husband and I started talking about having a baby I bought these strips mostly out of curiosity. They were very cheap so I thought why not... Well I have to say that they seem to work just fine and probably they helped us getting pregnant faster. I followed the instructions and they worked fine for me, giving consistent results every month. For the price I think it is totally worth it. Shortly after buying these I also purchased the pregnancy test strips and, when it happened, those actually gave me a much stronger signal than the test of another (much, much more expensive) brand.
customer_reviews.author: alelo

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch, wait until it's fixed!
customer_reviews.text: Something has gone wrong. First batch I bought worked great. 2nd and 3rd are trash. They come from same lot. I was able to return the 2nd, but not the 3rd because I bought from this seller. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to try and see when I ovulated because my period was irregular. Was clear as day and easy to understand. Got pregnant right after. I love that they come with so many strips unlike store ones that are so pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Control line barely shows up! Defective?  :(
customer_reviews.text: The control line barely shows up, so there is no way that I'll be able to tell if or when the test line is present. I have used several other brands of ovulation kits and have not had this issue. I only purchased this one, this time because Amazon recommended it. And now, it appears there's nothing i can do since it's not even eligible for return. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SKP

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool for Getting Pregnant
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend if you are trying to get pregnant. Way cheaper that what you can find in store so you don't feel bad taking a couple tests a day. I know a lot of it is biology, but I really think these helped me get pregnant twice within a couple months of starting each time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Hardman

customer_reviews.title: Best test for the best price
customer_reviews.text: These tests were what I call "stupid proof" and easy to use. I bought a small plastic cup with a wide lip for easier use in collecting urine and they were very effective. When the dark purple line came up it was loud and clear! Plus the day before had been a negative with nothing so I knew it was accuate. For fun, I tested the next two days and got positives. This was so accurate, that I got pregnant THIS month, July 2011, after only trying the day I got the first reading & the next! It helped ease off the pressure and now I know when I tend to ovulate so it's a GREAT product!! :D
customer_reviews.author: abcmom12

customer_reviews.title: THE Best OPK
customer_reviews.text: We use these as back up with the Clearblue Fertility Monitor. There are many versions of OPK strips- I’ve tried a dozen, and these are the BEST! The line is unmistakably dark when peak hits. The strip is sufficiently large. They work within 3 minutes- love them!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Great reliable brand.
customer_reviews.text: Great reliable brand. I have PCOS, but since having my son, I ovulate on my own now and these detect it (in conjunction with Tempdrop and a blood progesterone test to make sure, since these strips detect the surge before, but don't confirm the egg was actually released like temping and progesterone levels do).
customer_reviews.author: Angela Decker

customer_reviews.title: Better brands out there...
customer_reviews.text: They served their purpose, but I found more accuracy in other brands that were priced just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Aleah Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work pretty well!
customer_reviews.text: I was really frustrated with this product at first - but it turns out it wasn't the product's fault. I could not figure out when I was ovulating, and almost always had a faint second line on the strip that never seemed to get darker. As it turns out, I started ovulating later in my cycle and didn't catch it the first month. When I finally saw the dark second line, what a relief! So, these do work - I never had a dud in my package. But be patient until you can see what a positive actually looks like!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Barnes

customer_reviews.title: A must have for women trying to conceive!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for women trying to conceive!! There are so many ovulation predictor kits out there and they are super expensive for what you are getting. These are the best bargain! I used these for the first time along with one of the super expensive ClearBlue kits and this one was right on the money with the ClearBlue. When this was positive, so was the ClearBlue. I would recommend this to everyone I know who is looking to have a baby!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I can tell rather easily what is positive and what isn't
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done for cheaper! I have to say sometimes the strips aren't quite as prominent as other days, but since I'm more in touch with my body, I can tell rather easily what is positive and what isn't. I use fertility awareness to avoid pregnancy, and 10 months later, these things are still keeping me negative! (knock on wood!). Cheap and they work, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed that they gave such a high amount of tests ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these Jan 16, 2018. When I received them I immediately noticed that they expire in July 2018. I bought 50 of them! I won't go through 50 of them in 6 months time! I only use 5 per month, if that!!! I need to use them starting next week. I'm very disappointed that they gave such a high amount of tests with such a short expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Obgyn recommended I get these, much cheaper than the store. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Shalini Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Easy to use. It is very accurate in calculating ovulation gearing. I do wish the dye could come thru a little darker tho. However, I will recommend and or repurchase if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: These are such a great value for your money. Stop wasting tons of money on the store bought kits. These detect the same LH hormone at the same levels as the fancy store bought ones. These just don't come packaged in a plastic handle. If you are tracking ovulation, that typically means you've had some difficulty conceiving. So, you will probably need more than just oneonths worth of ovulation tests. This is your answer!
customer_reviews.author: Trish2010

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: We'd been trying to get pregnant for several months without success. I was using an ovulation prediction App on my iPad but since we weren't having any success so we decided to try these test strips. The reviews were very good and you simply can't beat the price. Sure enough, after using these strips for 1 monthly cycle, we got pregnant. The strips also happen to be a good at being a preliminary pregnancy test as well. They are not quite as accurate but since they are so inexpensive we used them to see if we were pregnant -- then we followed it up with a separate pregnancy test kit.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Did you know that if/when you run out of pregnancy tests these will work too? With my second child I had yet to have a period due to breatfeeding my first. We knew we wanted to try to conceive again, so we started using these. For some reason I got a positive result 6 days in a row. Little did I know that a positive can indicate both ovulation and pregnancy. I took a pregnancy test and discovered I was already expecting! Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sparling

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: These ovulation tests are great! They work really well. They progressively get darker leading up till ovulation so you know when you’re about to are you late. I highly recommend these don’t get any other brand
customer_reviews.author: Carmelita_83

customer_reviews.title: Non-Returnable ziplock bag strips
customer_reviews.text: This product was grouped with the ClearBlue fertility monitor so I thought there was compatibility... wrong. These strips came in a plastic ziplock partially opened, do not work with clearblue system, and to top it off are NON-RETURNABLE! Stick with the name brands vs rolling the dice with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Control line isn’t even correct color
customer_reviews.text: I have used these so many times except this batch is a bunch of duds. The control line is extremely faint when normally it’s a solid purple color. The last two months I don’t even know when my surge was because the strips stay the same. If the control line isn’t the color it’s supposed to be I can’t imagine the other line would be either.
customer_reviews.author: jsh

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I used the Wondfo Ovulation Tests with the Wondfo HPT. It's accurate! If you have to question whether your ovulation test is positive or not, it's probably a negative. I realized I only get a positive ovulation test on the months I test corretly. My cycles are irregular. I test from CD 14-27 only around 7-8 p.m. and prior to that, I don't eat, drink or pee for 2 hours. After doing the test correctly, I didn't ignore that pinching pain in my left ovary anymore. That's how I got my BFP!!! The only reason why I gave this a 4 star is because all the tests were slightly bent (packaging issue?). Baby dust to you all!
customer_reviews.author: squiggee

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Never got a positive with these using them 3 times a day, in spite of my elevated temperature clearly showing ovulation. It may have been my own fault as I drink a lot of fluids but the next month I used the digital ones and got a clear positive drinking exactly the same amount! I did like that they are small enough to glue to paper, cheap enough to use more than one a day, and when they dry you can still use them to see progression. Good product, but if you can't go without a lot of fluids they may not work for you!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda C Arellano-Ormsby

customer_reviews.title: Okay I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best on the market, but if you are TTC and want to buy in bulk then this would be the way to go. It is hard to read some of the test. I found I had to test more than once on several occasions, meaning you're wasting your test strips. Ultimately, the digital test strips are the easiest to read, but ungodly expensive if you're TTC more than one cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, accurate and if you are getting close to positive then negative, basically yo yo results it means there may be an issue with your ovulation. Not ovulating, having hormonal imbalance, especially high prolactin will make it tricky to have persistent results. When hormones in balance and you're surge is on track this will pick it up instantly and can predict your surge.
customer_reviews.author: IA Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: These are so much cheaper than digital tests. They come with instructions that explain when to start testing. There may seem to be guess work in the beginning, but once you see a positive one, you'll know it! Often times you'll see that customers buy little cups along with this; that's because you don't urinate directly on the stick, but dip the stick in the urine instead.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Changed design is less convenient but still works well
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve used this Wondfo product. The first time I used it was 3 years ago, and it was super easy and accurate. However, the product design appears to have changed so it really only works if you submerge the test strip in urine (as opposed to peeing on the stick). For that reason, it is much less convenient as currently designed. However, it’s cheap and accurately predicts ovulation, so it’s still worth 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rene

customer_reviews.title: and so far so good! They help me manage my rather irregular cycles ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a repeat buyer of these test strips as I track my cycles to prevent pregnancy, and so far so good! They help me manage my rather irregular cycles better. Best used after refraining from urination for 4-5 hours. And you should try not to consume any liquids during that time, as diluted urine doesn't give a great result. Also don't use FMU (first morning urine).
customer_reviews.author: Liz Hailand

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product to all couples TTC! They are small and they lay perfectly flat unlike some other brands. The instructions tell you exactly how to use them, they're easy. You dip in urine for 3 seconds and read results at the 5 minute mark.. I've been told by a lot of people to test twice a day so you don't miss it!
customer_reviews.author: ACGC

customer_reviews.title: ... weary about buying these ovulation predictors but I’m so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda weary about buying these ovulation predictors but I’m so glad I did. They work perfectly and haven’t had a single issue with them.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are very basic tiny strips. They do not come with any extra packaging or plastic, very simple very effective. These are the type of strips that you dip in a cup of urine than wait five minutes-if that's too long for you or too gross than you may have to go with a different brand. I did not have a single test pop up invalid and I know ladies that swear by these. But, either I didn't ovulate or these didn't detect it. I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: MNMom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for the price. Good quality. Easy to read. Much better than similarly priced test strips and even better quality than many much pricier options.
customer_reviews.author: theknitphomaniac

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: When I received my strips they came in a baggie and only 44 strips were inside. Also several of the strips read invalid which was very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Works as described and cheap too
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as described. Make sure to read the direction. This is different than pregnancy strips. The test line has to be as dark or darker than the comparison line for it to be considered "positive". Because it's so cheap compared to the grocery store version, we were able to check twice a day to make sure we didn't miss the window. Great product especially for the price. Good luck to all of you TTC-ing! Oh one more thing, the item sent actually has a pink handle not the green handle as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Wonky Control Lines
customer_reviews.text: My control lines were rarely one color but steaky which made reading them nearly impossible. I would not recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use, easy to read and interpret, and they are accurate. I used them in conjunction with the much more expensive Clearblue tests and always got the exact same the results. I'll definitely be using these from now on! They are individually packaged and came in a big ziploc bag with detailed instructions for use. I am very happy with my purchase, I trust them, and will continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Renee

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, For the Price?
customer_reviews.text: What could you have to complain about?? I've been using these LH (and even the PG) sticks for the last 6 months. They work wonderfully, and if used appropriately are easy to use. I think in 6 months I have gotten maybe 2 defective ones, but that is in general to be expected in anything that is mass produced. TTC (trying to conceive) is expensive. You want to use good products while still trying to hold onto some of your money - and these accomplish both!
customer_reviews.author: Christina L

customer_reviews.title: Test strips DO NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I have used these strips for many months without a single positive test. I went and bought a different brand at a local store. I used both strips for a month, and never had a positive strip with this brand, but the brand I bought at my local store showed a positive result. I do not feel these strips are any good. Sometimes you get what you pay for. I would never buy these again or recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Cook

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: These strips were incredibly easy to use! I was concerned that the tests wouldn't work or that they'd be hard to read but they were very clear! A positive test has two solid lines and a negative test has a faint line and a solid line: both are distinguishable. I am actually going to purchase these again AND I would absolutely recommend these strips.
customer_reviews.author: London

customer_reviews.title: Worked like advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and two other more expensive brands. I used these with the other brands. All three said I was not ovulating when I was not ovulating and then all three said I was when I was. I used them for three months. They worked just as well as the expensive ones so would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: A few of the strips have an indent or two in them (little nicks, really), but so far I haven't had a bad or non-functional test. Please note that with the Wondfo strips you will always have a faint test line (very obviously lighter than the control line) because it detects such a low level of LH. A positive is easy to recognize, though, and I've always caught them with these test strips.
customer_reviews.author: JustineEmily

customer_reviews.title: For the price you can't go wrong!!!
customer_reviews.text: It took me some time getting used to these strips as they are much thinner that what I have used in the past. I recommend using a cup and sticking the strip in there-so much easier! Pretty accurate and after the transition and learning process I am very happy with these over the much more $$$ digital ones. I will order again but hoping I wont have to!! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Rivera

customer_reviews.title: These were delivered as promised and work fine. They are the green handled version
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered as promised and work fine. They are the green handled version, which I have read are a knock-off but I don't know that for a fact. I had the blue handled ones before, and I was much happier with them. I've not been able to get a true positive with this set, which has been frustrating. I kept these and will finish them up, but will make sure that I get the real ones next time.
customer_reviews.author: J-Bug

customer_reviews.title: if you're trying, you need these
customer_reviews.text: These strips indicated I was ovulating and allowed me to plan a pregnancy almost to the day. So much easier than taking your temp, looking for signs, etc
customer_reviews.author: spartty

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the hcg tests by this brand, you always have a little lh in your system they are easy to read. No false positives. A positive is super dark and helpful for timing intercourse.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but lines are finicky.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because of its ease of use and price. The lines never really got as dark as the test line so I am a little concerned whether that is just how it normally is or if I don't have enough hormone or something. Not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sanity savers during weird cycles.
customer_reviews.text: Am I the only one who has fun looking at the lines changing intensity over the days?
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great If you are in for the long haul
customer_reviews.text: good: they are cheap, plentiful, and effective. Once you understand it, it shows you a rising LH as well as a Peak LH annoying: you have to go through a ton of them over a full cycle or two to get the hang of knowing what a real positive looks like. I recommend using these along with the fancy digital ones for your 1st cycle to understand them ... then you can save $$ by just using these there after.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Pinal

customer_reviews.title: Good product, definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for ovulation tracking and have yet to get a positive read but I'm not sure if it's the strips or if it's poor timing on my part. Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Unsure of reliability
customer_reviews.text: Not very reliable unless I'm ovulating several times per cycle. I've gotten a positive result approximately every 7 days, since I started using them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: YES!!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo glad I purchased these! Once they arrived I returned my more expensive store bought ones. Test twice a day, in the afternoon, and don't drink water or pee for two hours. It was my first cycle after Implanon removal so I had no idea when I was going to ovulate (happened on day 21) and I wish I had purchased these earlier and not wasted so much money on more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay. ...I guess
customer_reviews.text: The darkness of the control line and testing line were a bit difficult for me to interpret properly. I tested an average of twice a day in an effort to pinpoint my LH surge. I did notice the test line darken one day and figured that must be it. No such luck that month, I used Clearblue the next month and am now currently pregnant for the first time. Overall I would give this product 2 1/2 - 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Worker!
customer_reviews.text: Worked the first month we started using them after trying for 5 months on our own! Definitely read the instructions as these are different than pregnancy tests. But if you read and follow the instructions I think it was a WONDERFUL price for these wonderful little strips.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My go to OPK. Easy to track your ovulation and when its getting closer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clear and easy to use for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was uncertain about using these but after cost comparing with the digital style, I decided this was worth a try first. I have definitely not been disappointed. Each person probably has a slightly different experience, and mine has been very positive. When the hormone levels surge, the line is very distinctive and easy to interpret. The price is great and the packaging is very small and easy to store as well. I would absolutely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product that helps pinpoint ovulation. I was using the cheap Clear Blue Easy home test kit and getting readings all over the place. This was a cheap and (I think) accurate way to pinpoint the time of ovulation. Highly recommend them. Very inexpensive and easy to use and overall, much more reliable than the more expensive Clear Blue easy test sticks.
customer_reviews.author: T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Most of them are no good. Won't even show the control line. I've had 5 out of 15 work. Was past return date before I started to use them so I guess I'll keep trying the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A

customer_reviews.title: Easy.
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as discribed. Pregnant in one Months use highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RAD Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, accurate. Wonderful addition to charting.
customer_reviews.text: I've been charting my cycle for a few months now and think I've gotten the gist of that, but I still lacked full confidence about when I was ovulating. This set impressed me with its high number of positive reviews and the great deal that it was. I pulled them out at the time I and my chart said I would probably be ovulating, and everything matched up. The tests are so easy to use! Great little stockpile, this one.
customer_reviews.author: Emily J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Used as OPK and HPT!
customer_reviews.text: These little strips are awesome! We used them for a month and got pregnant the first month of using them (after tying several months). Just out of curiosity, I used a test strip on day 25 and found that both lines were the same color; very dark. I did some research and found that if this happens, there is a strong chance of pregnancy. I then immediately went to the grocery store and bought a HPT and got a positive result! I was baffled! This is where I found that an OPK may be used as a HPT: [...] I highly recommend these little sticks; much more inexpensive than store kits.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: These do their job!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo much cheaper than using Clear Blues! These are the ones for me.
customer_reviews.author: quesosauce

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: I did my reasearch comparing OPKs and these were the highest reccommended ones. For the price I went for it. I love how they slowly show the LH surge coming on. That was very helpful when tracking ovulation. I reccommended these to a friend and she's had success detecting ovulation more so with these than the digitals. Good product. Would be nice if they came with some pee cups. :)
customer_reviews.author: whateveritis

customer_reviews.title: Get it if trying to get preggers
customer_reviews.text: Would strongly recommend. A cost effective way to monitor ovulation, when positive it truly does match the color of the control so don't strain yourself wondering if ' faint lines' are positive. When it positive, you won't have to wonder whether it is positive.
customer_reviews.author: Geege

product_meta.title: Wondfo One Step Ovulation (LH) Test Strips, 50-Count
feature_bullets: Allows you to easily identify your "LH Surge" - the time you're most likely to conceive
All Tests FDA-Approved and over 99% Accurate

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
